                      SQLException

        reference to created day

        SQLException - if database operation fails

      • addHeatFromFile

        public Heat addHeatFromFile(TestDay day,
                   String filename,
                   String time,
                   Parser parser)
                     throws IOException,
                            ParseException,
                            SQLException
        Inserts Heat to database and reads laptimes from file
        Parameters:
        day - as a TestDay object already persisted in the database
        filename - as a string
        time - of the day as a string
        parser - to be used for parsing laptimes
        Returns:
        created Heat
        Throws:
        IOException - if file opening fails
        ParseException - if parsing time or file fails
        SQLException - if database operation fails

      • addHeatFromFile

                   Path path,
                   String time,
                   Parser parser)
                     throws IOException,
                            ParseException,
                            SQLException
        Inserts Heat to database and reads laptimes from file
        Parameters:
        day - as a TestDay object already persisted in the database
        path - to file to be read
        time - of the day as a string
        parser - to be used for parsing laptimes
        Returns:
        created Heat
        Throws:
        IOException - if file opening fails
        ParseException - if parsing time or file fails
        SQLException - if database operation fails

      • addHeat

        public Heat addHeat(TestDay day,
           String[] lines,
           String time,
           Parser parser)
             throws ParseException,
                    SQLException
        Inserts Heat including laptimes to database
        Parameters:
        day - as a TestDay object already persisted in the database
        lines - laptimes in array of strings
        time - of the day as a string
        parser - to be used for parsing laptimes
        Returns:
        created Heat
        Throws:
        ParseException - if parsing time or laptimes fails
        SQLException - if database operation fails
